input.sentences: we decided to just be a little crazy at work .
we finished the project early and decided to relax .
even the manager is relaxing a little .
the whole project team is ready to party because the project was a success .
output.sentences: There comes a time at work where you just want to have fun.
The group of coworkers decided to create crazy poses and faces.
They were all able to relax once their project was finished.
It's relaxing for the whole team when the manager is happy.
The team is ready to take on the world with success.
